mdx.rawBody:
# Core Services


Webizen has a particular series of knowledge infrastructure services that are part of how the webizen ecosystem functions.

These include;
- [[DecentralisedOntologies]]
- [[PermissiveCommons]]
- [[TemporalSemantics]]
- [[VerifiableClaims&Credentials]]
